description: When the data source is in JSON format, the mapping must specify that the rml:referenceFormulation is ql:JSONPath. In addition, a JSON Path iterator must be provided using rml:iterator in order to split the original data and iterate over the fragments. Complete the mapping below specifying that the format of the file is JSON by using ql:JSONPath, provide as iterator "$.*", and specify that the subjects are sch:Place.
